title.narrative: FINANCIAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT

description.narrative: By 2022, the office has established effective,efficient and transparent financial and administrative support services including anti-fraud systems and culture of fraud detection and prevention., which contributes to Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Operational efficiency and effectiveness in pursuit of results

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, the office has established effective,efficient and transparent financial and administrative support services includinganti-fraud systems and culture of fraud detection and prevention.

description.narrative: Nonobstant le contexte difficile de COVID-19 et Ebola, l’appui apporté par les opérations à Conakry et dans les bureaux de zone (Nzérékoré, Kankan, Labé) a contribué à la poursuite des activités aussi bien de réponse aux urgences que de développement ainsi que l&39;atteinte des résultats collectifs du bureau pour 2021. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/02/2022
